name: unerringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that hits a target without failing: The ball went unerringly into the hole. He stands on the training ground, pinging shots unerringly past the poor young goalkeepers.
in a way that is always accurate or good, never failing or making a mistake: The writing is razor-sharp and unerringly intelligent. The standard of music is unerringly high. See
unerring
More examplesFewer examplesHe was unerringly accurate with his boot, kicking 19 points.The ski instructor was unerringly charming and helpful.The ensemble's dancing is unerringly precise.
